title: Define Quantum Entanglement Principles
description: Conduct comprehensive research on the fundamental principles of quantum entanglement. The documentation will include clear explanations, examples, and implications for the QuantumEntanglementCommunicator project. It will also detail potential use cases, theoretical applications, and explore the challenges and limitations associated with implementing quantum entanglement for instantaneous communication. This task aims to establish a solid foundation of understanding for the development team.

title: Design Quantum Communication Protocol
description: Develop a protocol for utilizing quantum entanglement for communication.

title: Prototype Quantum Communication Device
description: Develop a functional prototype of the quantum communication device. This involves researching and implementing principles of quantum entanglement for communication, with a focus on optimizing performance for interplanetary use cases.\nConsider adding a section in the description highlighting potential challenges and proposed solutions for interplanetary communication. Also, ensure that the prototype is designed with scalability in mind.

title: Develop Interplanetary QE Communication Software
description: Write the software for interplanetary quantum entanglement communication.

title: Implement Security Measures for QE Communicator
description: Ensure secure communication by implementing appropriate security measures.

title: Create User Manual for Quantum Entanglement Communicator
description: Write a user manual detailing the operation, setup, and usage of the quantum entanglement communicator. Include sections on safety precautions, troubleshooting, and FAQs.
